description: Get a list of cost allocation tags. All inputs in the API are optional and serve as filters. By default, all cost allocation tags are returned.

parameters.name: TagKeys
parameters.description: The list of cost allocation tag keys that are returned for this request. (string) ---

nested_items.name: CostAllocationTags
nested_items.description: A list of cost allocation tags that includes the detailed metadata for each one.

nested_items.name: TagKey
nested_items.description: The key for the cost allocation tag.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of cost allocation tag. You can use AWSGenerated or UserDefined type tags. AWSGenerated type tags are tags that Amazon Web Services defines and applies to support Amazon Web Services resources for cost allocation purposes. UserDefined type tags are tags that you define, create, and apply to resources.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a cost allocation tag.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The last date that the tag was either activated or deactivated.

nested_items.name: LastUsedDate
nested_items.description: The last month that the tag was used on an Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The token to retrieve the next set of results. Amazon Web Services provides the token when the response from a previous call has more results than the maximum page size.
